Description: A unique Borrower assigned ID for the loan listing.
The state provided by the borrower in the loan application
Occupational categories
Value of current property
Years at present job
The gender of the borrower (M = Male , F = Female)
The education level of the borrower (UB = under bachelor’s or equivalent level , B = bachelor’s or equivalent level)
The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration (RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER)
Number of major derogatory reports
The ratio of the borrower's total debt payments to their income
Number of delinquent credit lines
This is the primary key of the date dimension table and uniquely identifies each date.
This is the actual date represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
This column contains the name of the day of the week (e.g., Monday, Tuesday, etc.).
This column contains the day of the week represented as a number (e.g., 1 - 7 etc.).
This column contains the day of the month represented as a number (e.g., 1, 2, 3, etc.).
This column contains the day of the year represented as a number (e.g., 1 for January 1, 365 for December 31 in a non-leap year).
This column contains the week of the year represented as a number (e.g., 1 for the first week of January).
An ISO week-numbering year (also called ISO year informally) has 52 or 53 full weeks.
This column contains the number of the month (e.g., 1 for January, 2 for February, etc.).
This column contains the name of the month (e.g., January, February, etc.).
This column contains the Short name of the month (e.g., Jan, Feb, etc.).
This column contains the name of the quarter (e.g., Q1, Q2, etc.).
This column contains the year represented as a number (e.g., 2023).
This column contains actual date of firstday of this month represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
This column contains actual date of lastday of this month represented in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
This is the actual date represented in the format YYYY-MM
This column contains the name that indicates whether the date falls on a weekend (e.g.,weekend,weekday).

House price index at origination time, base year = 100

delinquency observation at observation time (Yes= 1  , no = 0)
Default (1), payoff (2), and nondefault/nonpayoff (0) observation at observation time
Real estate type  = 1, otherwise = 0
A unique identifier for each loan purpose in the dimension table
The name or description of the loan purpose, such as "Car Loan" or "Mortgage Loan"
